post:
So who are we? We are the Humans over @ DialANetwork. We love to spread our passion into our service, we love a laugh and we love our clients!

We have been providing a range of hosting services for over 14 months now, with around 4 different companies worldwide!
We provide something different, a decent service, something we are known for, our support is one of the fastest systems around, with ticket replies almost instant through out the day and night!

Our servers utilize at least 8GB of DDR3 Ram, 2 x 500GB/1TB disks in RAID 1 and of course Quad cores or higher.
Our uptime has been great for the last year or so, with the odd outage or reboot, but generally a great service for all!

Apply the promotion code 'Dserver25' to grab 25% recurring discount on any order!

Questions and answers

Uptime?
We have a pretty solid uptime, we have had two or three outages in the last 6 months, however each lasted less than 3 minutes.

Oversold?
Well from the price and plans, I am sure you can see they are not oversold. We hold a no overselling policy, quality is key! We want our customers to stay not run!

Company?
DialANetwork Limited is currently operating DialAServer, however within the next day DialAServer will become it's own private limited UK company.
DialANetwork has been around for the past 15 months, so we are here to stay.

Locations?
We offer 4 locations, however the current stock is USA, we also have some French stock, so do ask if you want another location.

Expensive?
We think our prices are stable, friendly and fairly low priced since they include management as well.

Setup?
All servers are deployed instant, however some errors may happen from time to time, so submit a ticket if this isn't the case.

We are a friendly bunch, so give us a shout, and let us know any thoughts and feedback! Don't forget to test our support!

All the best

Visit us? www.dialaserver.co.uk
